thread.title: Texas Bombings, a Maryland Shooter and Some Good Cops - WSJ

author: James Freeman
title: Texas Bombings, a Maryland Shooter and Some Good Cops - WSJ
text:
Leave it to the legendary law enforcers of Texas to help restore confidence in American policing. Also this week, a brave Marylander affirmed that the FBI and Broward County failures that enabled the horror in Parkland, Florida do not represent a new normal in U.S. public safety.
After a series of bombings in recent weeks around Austin, Texas, a team of local, state and federal law enforcers—with help from tips from concerned citizens—tracked down the suspect on Tuesday in the town of Round Rock. According to the Journal:
... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
